sourcesContent:
<template>
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://use.typekit.net/msv4llb.css" />
  <JobPosition
    v-for="position in positions"
    v-bind:key="position.sys.id"
    v-bind:company="position.company"
    v-bind:title="position.title"
    v-bind:description="position.description2"
    v-bind:startDate="position.startDate"
    v-bind:endDate="position.endDate"
  />
</template>

<script>
import JobPosition from "./components/position.vue";

export default {
  name: "App",
  components: { JobPosition },
  data() {
    return {
      positions: [],
    };
  },
  async created() {
    this.positions = await this.getPositions();
  },

  methods: {
    getPositions: async () => {
      const query = `{
            jobCollection(order: [startDate_DESC]) {
              items {
                sys {
                  id
                }
                company
                title
                startDate
                endDate
                description2
              }
            }
         }`;

      const fetchUrl = `https://graphql.contentful.com/content/v1/spaces/${process.env.VUE_APP_CONTENTFUL_SPACE_ID}`;
      const fetchOptions = {
        method: "POST",
        headers: {
          Authorization: `Bearer ${process.env.VUE_APP_CONTENTFUL_ACCESS_TOKEN}`,
          "Content-Type": "application/json",
        },
        body: JSON.stringify({
          query,
        }),
      };

      try {
        const response = await fetch(fetchUrl, fetchOptions).then((response) =>
          response.json()
        );
        return response.data.jobCollection.items;
      } catch (error) {
        // throw new Error("Could not receive the data from Contentful!");
        console.log(error);
      }
    },
  },
};
</script>

<style>
* {
  font-family: "proxima-nova", "Helvetica Neue", Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
  color: #232830;
}

html {
  font-size: 100%;
} /*16px*/

body {
  background: white;
  font-weight: 400;
  color: #000000;
}

p {
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

h1,
h2,
h3,
h4,
h5 {
  font-weight: 400;
}

h1 {
  font-size: 3.052rem;
}

h2 {
  font-size: 2.441rem;
}

h3 {
  font-size: 1.953rem;
}

h4 {
  font-size: 1.563rem;
}

h5 {
  font-size: 1.25rem;
}

small,
.text_small {
  font-size: 0.8rem;
}
</style>
